settings.content: Discover the gentlest, cleanest, and most versatile wipes for every moment of life. The Terra Sachets Free Sample Pack includes outdoor wipes, pet wipes, kids wipes, skincare wipes, and intimacy wipes, all formulated with 100% natural ingredients and skin-friendly plant-based formulations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
1. Peel open the TERRA wipe sachet and take out a wipe.
  2. Wipe the desired area using gentle, smooth motions.
  3. Use additional wipes as needed for complete cleaning.
  4. Dispose of the used wipe responsibly, do not flush.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions

settings.text: Explore answers to the most common questions about the Terra Sachets Pack, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.

settings.heading: How often can I safely use Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are designed for daily use and can be used multiple times per day whenever needed. Their plant-based, skin-friendly formulation ensures they remain gentle even with frequent use.

settings.heading: What is the correct way to use Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Gently remove a wipe from the pack and apply it directly to your skin. Avoid contact with the eyes, and do not use on broken or severely irritated skin. Once used, dispose of the wipe responsibly, do not flush.

settings.heading: How will my Terra Wipes order be delivered?
Are Terra Wipes cruelty-free?
settings.content: Yes, all Terra products, including our wipes, are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

settings.heading: What is the shelf life of Terra Wipes, and how should they be stored?
settings.content: Terra Wipes have a shelf life of 24 months from the date of manufacture. To keep them fresh, store them in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and heat.

settings.heading: Do Terra Wipes contain any common allergens?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are carefully formulated to be free from common irritants, including alcohol, parabens, and chlorine. However, we always recommend checking the ingredient list if you have specific allergies or sensitivities.

settings.heading: Are there any safety precautions I should follow with Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Yes, for external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes. Do not use on broken, inflamed, or severely irritated skin. Keep out of reach of children unless under adult supervision.

settings.heading: Where are Terra Wipes manufactured?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are proudly made in New Zealand, following the highest international safety and quality standards.

settings.heading: How should I dispose of Terra Wipes and their packaging?
settings.content: Terra Wipes should not be flushed. They can be disposed of in household waste or compost bins, if available. Packaging can be recycled, depending on local recycling programs.

settings.heading: Do Terra Wipes have a fragrance?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are either fragrance-free (perfect for sensitive skin and babies) or lightly scented with natural oils, depending on the product type. No synthetic fragrances are ever used.

settings.heading: What is included in the Terra Sachets Free Sample Pack?
settings.content: The pack includes a curated selection of outdoor wipes, pet wipes, kids wipes, skincare wipes, and intimacy wipes.

settings.heading: Is the sample really free?
settings.content: Yes, the wipes are free. Standard shipping charges apply.

settings.heading: Can I receive more than one sample pack?
settings.content: No, Customers can receive one sample pack per lifetime. Any additional orders may be cancelled.

settings.heading: Are the wipes safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra wipes are dermatologically tested, hypoallergenic, and formulated with gentle, plant-based ingredients suitable for sensitive skin, including sensitive baby skin.

settings.heading: Are the skincare and intimacy wipes safe for daily use?
settings.content: Absolutely, they are formulated with mild, skin-loving ingredients appropriate for regular use.

settings.heading: Are the kids' wipes safe for the face and hands?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Kids Wipes are safe for hands, faces, toys, and surfaces, and contain no harsh chemicals.

settings.heading: Are the pet wipes safe for animals?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Pet Wipes are designed for fur, paws, eyes, and ears, depending on the type, using pet-safe ingredients with no irritants.

settings.heading: Are Terra Outdoor Wipes suitable for travel or camping?
settings.content: Yes, they are created specifically for outdoor use, perfect for camping, hiking, picnics, and travel.

settings.heading: Do Terra wipes contain alcohol or fragrances?
settings.content: Most Terra wipes are alcohol-free and fragrance-free, except where category-specific formulations require minimal safe levels.

settings.heading: Are the sachets biodegradable?
settings.content: The wipe materials are made from biodegradable bamboo fibre. Sachet packaging is designed to minimise environmental impact.

settings.heading: Are these wipes safe to use around food or children?
settings.content: Yes, Terra uses food-safe ink and child-safe formulations, making them suitable for family environments.

settings.heading: Can I buy full-size packs after trying the sample?
settings.content: Yes, all wipe categories are available in full-size packs across the Terra range.

settings.subheading_faq: Explore answers to the most common questions about the Terra Sachets Pack, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.
